summary: Add Mapquest/OSM to the list of tile sources

comments.content:
Mapquest recently turned into OSM [1] and launched open.mapquest.com.

They're using OSM data and a custom opensourced stylesheet [2] of their own for Mapnik.

Map API is fully compatible with OSM format [3].

Since it's directly OSM related I think these maps have their place in the list of tile sources.

Patch attached.

In few months (when finished and on the Market) I will also add the project I'm working on to the list of applications using osmdroid jar :)

[1]
http://blog.mapquest.com/2010/12/16/mapquest-proudly-introduces-open-mapquest-com/
[2]
https://github.com/MapQuest/MapQuest-Mapnik-Style
[3]
http://developer.mapquest.com/web/products/open/map
This issue was closed by revision r722.
